title: 5/3/17 - Finding an American treasure...At A Garage Sale (Paul Kengor)
description:
A TV news reporter loses her job for quoting a viewer's use of the 'n word' ...Paul Kengor discusses the special bond between Pope John Paul II & President Ronald Reagan ...Finding an original copy of the Declaration of Independence...at a garage sale ...

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
